mapper.update: UPDATE tb_lecture_session SET session_date = #{sessionDate} WHERE lecture_session_id = #{lectureSessionId};
mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM adayoflearning.tb_reserve r JOIN tb_payment p ON r.reserve_id = p.reserve_id WHERE r.lecture_session_id = adayoflearning.tb_lecture_session.lecture_session_id AND p.state ='결제 완료') as students FROM adayoflearning.tb_lecture_session WHERE lecture_id = #{lecuteId} AND session_date BETWEEN #{date} AND DATE_ADD(#{date}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
